name: JUST HOOPS - Arcade Basketball
summary: Retro Inspired. Future Forward. Derived from the arcade classic Pop-A-Shot, JUST HOOPS brings retro arcade-basketball to new school mixed reality. Featuring over 60 levels of changing hoops, numerous challenges, and multiple play modes, JUST HOOPS can turn any slow moment into an exciting time with friends and family.   Pull Up. Wherever you are!
